PropertySubHeader1: Property Insurance against Fire, Particular Risks
PropertySubHeader1Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to properties by any named peril in the policy wording
PropertySubHeader1AdvantagesPoint1: All of our products are compliant with the Islamic Sharia Law
PropertySubHeader2Desc1: Policy covers all sudden and unforeseen material damages and losses that may be expose to properties by any peril other than the specifically excluded in the policy.
PropertySubHeader2AddCov: Additional Coverage (to be added upon request):
PropertySubHeader2AddCovPoint2: Expenses for professionals, architects and surveyors.
PropertySubHeader2AddCovPoint3: Property under the care, custody and control of the Insured.
